lead_paragraph: Portuguese coach Fernando Santos said his hardest task will be keeping his "kids" grounded after they advanced to the semi-finals with a win over Poland on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: 'Kid' Trouble for Coach Santos as Portugal Progress
headline.main: 'Kid' Trouble for Coach Santos as Portugal Progress

snippet: Portuguese coach Fernando Santos said his hardest task will be keeping his "kids" grounded after they advanced to the semi-finals with a win over Poland on Thursday....
